models.description: A compact and speedy model, perfect for everyday conversations and quick questions. It's the fastest to download and uses the least memory.
A powerful small model from Microsoft that punches well above its weight class in reasoning and logic tasks. Excellent performance for its size.
strengths: Top-tier reasoning for a small model
limitations: Less general knowledge than huge models

models.description: A high-quality and versatile model that provides a great balance between performance and size. Excellent for writing assistance and complex instructions.
limitations: Requires more memory than smaller models

models.description: A specialized model designed for programming and code-related tasks. It can help you write, debug, and understand code in various languages.
Google's high-quality open model, built from the same research as Gemini. Offers a great blend of conversational ability and instruction following.
limitations: Can be overly cautious in responses
Newer, so community support is growing

models.description: The latest generation model from Meta, offering state-of-the-art performance in reasoning, conversation, and following complex instructions.
limitations: Requires a capable system for best performance

models.description: A powerful and creative model that excels at generating detailed text and engaging in more nuanced conversations. Ideal for creative writing and in-depth discussions.
